item.description:
Caught a brief snippet on the news last night that the MFA has just recently opened it's new Art of the America's exhibit. This is a multi-million dollar expansion project showcasing several centuries worth of art & furniture. Looks VERY impressive. Any interest in scheduling a meetup for a Saturday or Sunday this month (might just be a great respite from the Holiday madness)?

We'll meet at the Huntington Street entrance and head in together at 6.
item.name: Museum of Fine Arts -
